articles.title: Aquaman 2 delayed to 2023 as Black Adam is pushed back as Warner Bros. release dates are shuffled - Daily Mail
articles.description: Warner Bros. announced they have shuffled the release dates for several of their highly-anticipated films.
articles.content:
It is a superhero shakeup as Aquaman 2, The Flash, Black Adam, and Shazam have all been pushed back due to COVID-19 related production delays.
